typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	skipLines: 1,
	wildcardPaths:['inbound/site/USR/WEH/*.gz']) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'adls',
	folderPath: 'translated/delta/site/USR/WEH',
	truncate: false,
	mergeSchema: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
